angelus_1.english: The Angel of the Lord declared unto Mary;

angelus_response_1.english: And she conceived of the Holy Spirit.

angelus_2.title_english: Behold the Handmaid of the Lord
angelus_2.english: Behold the handmaid of the Lord;

angelus_response_2.english: Be it done unto me according to Thy word.

angelus_3.title_english: And the Word Was Made Flesh
angelus_3.english: And the Word was made flesh;

angelus_closing_versicle.latin: Ora pro nobis, sancta Dei Genetrix;
angelus_closing_versicle.english: Pray for us, O holy Mother of God;

angelus_closing_response.title_english: That We May Be Made Worthy
angelus_closing_response.english: That we may be made worthy of the promises of Christ.

let_us_pray.latin: Gratiam tuam, quaesumus, Domine, mentibus nostris infunde; ut qui, Angelo nuntiante, Christi Filii tui Incarnationem cognovimus, per Passionem eius et Crucem ad Resurrectionis gloriam perducamur. Per eundem Christum Dominum nostrum. Amen.
let_us_pray.english: Pour forth, we beseech Thee, O Lord, Thy grace into our hearts; that we, to whom the Incarnation of Christ Thy Son was made known by the message of an angel, may, by His Passion and Cross, be brought to the glory of His Resurrection. Through the same Christ our Lord. Amen.
